Name: Conflagration Chain: True/False VI
Desc:
This is a chain skill that shares its skill level with Conflagration Chain: Heaven. After using Conflagration Chain: Sky, jumps into the air with a blaze.
Conflagration Chain: False does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Required Skill: This is a chain skill that shares its skill level with Conflagration Chain: False Lv. 30 or higher

Desc.Old:
This is a chain skill that shares its skill level with Conflagration Chain: Heaven. After using Conflagration Chain: Heaven, Ho Young jumps into the air with a blaze.

Conflagration Chain: False does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Required Skill: Conflagration Chain: Heaven Lv. 30 or above
